title: Detaching Roots: Poetry and Prose
description: Detaching Roots extracts the most the pain that we all experience, and bleeds them onto paper; spilling out words that everyone can understand. This book will target anyone who has dealt with the atrocities of life and faced most of them alone. It is divided into four sections, and each one serves a distinct and unique purpose. Detaching Roots will take you on an emotional journey from start to finish.
author: Beverly Maier
